title: Nathan Wu
text:
Biography
I am a PhD student at the Institute for Bioengineering at the University of Edinburgh. I am based in the Dunn Group and work on DNA nanotechnology-based methods to detect cancer biomarkers such as circulating tumour DNA. In addition to this research, I am interested in synthetic biology for biomedical applications.


Education
MSc in Biotechnology (2019) | University of Edinburgh
BSc in Biochemistry (2018) | Liverpool John Moores University
